title: Science Learning Efficiency Improvement Program Using Micro-Break Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary science concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Strategies to improve attention and quiz performance in science learning processes using mobile devices for general citizens aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can improve quiz accuracy rates by 20% by applying 2-minute micro-breaks after each 15-minute learning unit within two weeks.
Learners can extend learning concentration time by 30% compared to baseline by utilizing cognitive load management strategies at the end of a 4-week course.
Learners can store learning content 10% more effectively in long-term memory by applying cognitive restructuring techniques during micro-breaks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
